fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Hand someone a can of pringles, each day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The following night, they will eat the Pringles. Except the Pringles are not Pringles and are rocks so they die (are dealt a powerful attack)
-Additionally they share the Pringles with each of their visitors so each visitors dies (is dealt a powerful attack) too
-Each night everyone that visits you is also handed a can of pringles
-Players do not know they are handed a can of pringles
